p: The yield of the two extraction methods for the three plants was calculated using the formula described by Falleh et al. [ 71]: Y (%) = 100 M ext/M ech, where Y is the yield of extraction in %, M ext is the mass of the extract after the evaporation (using the rotary evaporator) of the extraction solvent in mg, and M ech is the mass of the plant sample in mg.
